title: Hextech Tool to small
body: I got a problem with the Hextech Repair Tool. I can start it but when it opens its a small window and i cant make it bigger. I can click on things but im not able to read anything because its so small like 7 x 9 cm.

replies.body: That's pretty strange indeed. You should be able to just drag the window to make it bigger, but if it won't stretch you can go ahead and try redownloading it and running it as admin when you open it.

I know this doesnt accord to the Theme. Why can i only have 2 Mastery Pages (New Update) will it stay like this i mean 2 is seriously nothing i made now 2 Morgana Supp pages yeah 2 but i have like 20 i would like to create and i wont spend that many riot points or IP.
You can have more than 2 rune pages, but each additional page needs to be bought through the store for RP or BE.
